channel.title: Wings

item.title: Wings
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

So, I added the flying animation to when you wear wings, in the client class. But, it won’t work. Why? Here’s how I added: public int GetStandAnim(int id) { if(id == 6543) //devil wings { return 1500; }public int GetWalkAnim(int id) { if(id == 6543) //devil wings { return 1851; }

Read full topic
